title: Work, Energy, and Power in Timor-Leste

questions.question: What is the formula for work in physics?
In the context of Timorese farming, what is an example of work being done?
choices: A farmer holding a heavy sack of rice
A farmer swinging a machete to cut vegetation
Water sitting in an irrigation tank
questions.answer: A farmer swinging a machete to cut vegetation

questions.question: What is the formula for kinetic energy?
What type of energy is stored in elevated water for irrigation systems?
What is the formula for gravitational potential energy?
What does the principle of conservation of energy state?
choices: Energy can be created but not destroyed
Energy can be destroyed but not created
Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed
Energy can be both created and destroyed
questions.answer: Energy cannot be created or destroyed, only transformed

questions.question: When a Timorese farmer lifts a heavy load, what energy transformation occurs?
What is the definition of power in physics?
choices: The total energy in a system
The rate at which work is done or energy is transferred
questions.answer: The rate at which work is done or energy is transferred

questions.question: What is the formula for power?
Which of the following is an example of a simple machine used in Timorese farming?
What is the primary benefit of using simple machines in farming?
choices: They reduce the total amount of work required
They increase the speed of farming operations
They allow farmers to apply smaller forces over longer distances
They eliminate the need for human labor
questions.answer: They allow farmers to apply smaller forces over longer distances

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a form of energy commonly found in Timorese farming communities?
What type of energy transformation occurs when water flows down from an elevated irrigation tank?
Which of the following cooking methods in Timor-Leste typically has the lowest power efficiency?
What is mechanical advantage in the context of simple machines?
choices: The ability to reduce the total amount of work
The ratio of output force to input force
The speed at which work is done
The amount of energy stored in the machine
questions.answer: The ratio of output force to input force

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of potential energy in Timorese agriculture?
choices: Water stored in an elevated tank
questions.answer: Water stored in an elevated tank

questions.question: What unit is typically used to measure work and energy?
What unit is used to measure power?
In the equation W = F * d * cos(θ), what does θ represent?
choices: The angle between the force and displacement vectors
questions.answer: The angle between the force and displacement vectors

questions.question: Which of the following would NOT be considered work in the physics sense?
choices: Pushing a plow across a field

questions.question: What type of energy transformation occurs in a solar cooker?
Which of the following would increase the gravitational potential energy of an object?
choices: Raising it to a higher elevation
questions.answer: Raising it to a higher elevation

questions.question: What is the primary advantage of understanding work, energy, and power concepts in Timorese agriculture?
choices: It allows for the creation of energy
It eliminates the need for human labor
It can lead to improvements in efficiency and productivity
questions.answer: It can lead to improvements in efficiency and productivity

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of kinetic energy in Timorese farming?
choices: Water flowing in an irrigation channel
questions.answer: Water flowing in an irrigation channel

questions.question: What happens to the kinetic energy of a falling object just before it hits the ground?
Which of the following would NOT help improve energy efficiency in Timorese cooking methods?
choices: Increasing the use of open-fire stoves
questions.answer: Increasing the use of open-fire stoves

questions.question: What is the relationship between work and energy?
choices: Work is a form of energy
Energy is a form of work
Work is the transfer of energy
There is no relationship between work and energy
questions.answer: Work is the transfer of energy

questions.question: In the context of Timorese farming, what does increasing the power output of a task mean?
choices: Doing more work in less time
questions.answer: Doing more work in less time

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of energy transformation in a traditional Timorese cooking fire?
What type of energy does food primarily store?
